dcterms:description: MNIST dataset includes 60,000 handwritten digits from number 0 to number 9. One class is regarded as normal class, while the rest of the classes belong to the anomaly.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: CIFAR10 dataset also has ten classes. One class is considered as normal and the rest as abnormal for anomaly detection.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:description: The German Traffic Sign Recognition Benchmark (GTSRB) dataset includes adversarial boundary attack on stop signs boards.
dcterms:title: GTSRB (German Traffic Sign Recognition Benchmark)
